title: Relaxing Sunshine Coast Stay With Daily Breakfast
description: Experience the laidback vibes of the Sunshine Coast with a relaxing stay including daily breakfast at Pelican Waters Resort. Perfect for families and couples, this sun-kissed hotel features a Greg Norman-designed championship golf course and is located close to the seaside town of Caloundra and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Glasshouse Mountains.
location_description: Pelican Waters Resort (until 1 May 2020 - formerly The Sebel Pelican Waters Golf Resort & Spa)

title: Idyllic Sunshine Coast Stay Close to Beaches and Natural Attractions
description: Your idyllic escape awaits just minutes from the shores of Golden Beach with a relaxing stay at Pelican Waters Resort. Located in the heart of the laidback Sunshine Coast, only 90 minutes from Brisbane with breathtaking views over the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Glass House Mountains, this resort retreat is perfect for unwinding poolside, discovering the plethora of natural wonders or perfecting your golf swing on the Greg Norman-designed course. Includes daily continental breakfast, 25% off all onsite food and drink purchases, complimentary Wi-Fi and a guaranteed 12pm late check-out included.
location_description: Pelican Waters Resort (The Sebel Pelican Waters Golf Resort & Spa)

title: Relaxing Sunshine Coast Stay at The Sebel
description: Experience the laidback vibes of the Sunshine Coast with a relaxing stay including daily breakfast at The Sebel Pelican Waters Golf Resort & Spa. Perfect for families and couples, this sun-kissed hotel features a Greg Norman-designed championship golf course and is located close to the seaside town of Caloundra and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Glasshouse Mountains.
location_description: The Sebel Pelican Waters Golf Resort & Spa 2018 (Until 1 November 2019 )
